page.title: 11A description of the area.
page.content: This has to be one of the most beautiful areas of the countryside to live in. There are some well preserved old buildings and there are many many footpaths on which to walk. When we were trying to contact land owners of the various farms, we found that there were in the main only two real owners. One of them was the Earl Howe. This is not surprising as historically the Earls Howe have owned much of the land. The most surprising aspect was that nearly all of the farms had been converted to luxury country retreats and homes. It seems that most of the farming is done by only a very few farmers, notably The Grange Farm and Seagraves Farm.
